original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.

original: Addasāsuṁ kho gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino bhagavantaṁ yena coro aṅgulimālo tenaddhānamaggapaṭipannaṁ.

original: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā coro aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṁ pakatiyā gacchantaṁ sabbathāmena gacchanto na sakkoti sampāpuṇituṁ.

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai aṅgulimālaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha bhante pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, sāvatthiyaṁ sapadānaṁ piṇḍāya caramāno aññataraṁ itthiṁ mūḷhagabbhaṁ vighātagabbhaṁ.
analyzed: addasam kho aha bhante sāvatthiyam sa padānam piṇḍāya caramānaḥ aññataram itthim mūḷha gabbham vighāta gabbha
disvāna mayham

original: ‘kilissanti vata bho sattā, kilissanti vata bho sattā’”ti.
analyzed: kilissanti vata bho sattā kilissanti vata bho sattā ati

original: “Tena hi tvaṁ, aṅgulimāla, yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ itthiṁ evaṁ vadehi:
analyzed: tena hi tva aṅguli māla yena sā itthī tena upasaṅkama upasaṅkamitvā tam itthim evam vadehi

original: ‘yatohaṁ, bhagini, jāto nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropetā, tena saccena sotthi te hotu, sotthi gabbhassā’”ti.
analyzed: yatas ha bhagini jātaḥ na abhijānāmi sañcit ca pāṇam jīvitā vā uropetā tena saccena sotthi te hotu sotthi gabbhassa ati

original: “So hi nūna me, bhante, sampajānamusāvādo bhavissati.
analyzed: saḥ hi nūna me bhante sampajāna musāvādaḥ bhavissati

original: Mayā hi, bhante, bahū sañcicca pāṇā jīvitā voropitā”ti.
analyzed: mayā hi bhante bahū sañcit ca pāṇāḥ jīvitā voropitā ati

original: “Tena hi tvaṁ, aṅgulimāla, yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ itthiṁ evaṁ vadehi:
analyzed: tena hi tva aṅguli māla yena sā itthī tena upasaṅkama upasaṅkamitvā tam itthim evam vadehi

original: ‘yatohaṁ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto, nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropetā, tena saccena sotthi te hotu, sotthi gabbhassā’”ti.
analyzed: yatas ha bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jātaḥ na abhijānāmi sañcit ca pāṇam jīvitā vā uropetā tena saccena sotthi te hotu sotthi gabbhassa ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo bhagavato paṭissutvā yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eva bhanta iti kho āyasman aṅgulimālaḥ bhagavato paṭissutvā yena sā itthī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam itthim etat avoca

original: “yatohaṁ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto, nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropetā, tena saccena sotthi te hotu, sotthi gabbhassā”ti.
analyzed: yatas ha bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jātaḥ na abhijānāmi sañcit ca pāṇam jīvitā vā uropetā tena saccena sotthi te hotu sotthi gabbhassa ati

original: Atha khvāssā itthiyā sotthi ahosi, sotthi gabbhassa.
analyzed: atha khvā assā itthiyā sotthi ahosi sotthi gabbhassa

original: Atha kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
analyzed: atha kho āyasman aṅgulimālo ekaḥ vūpakaṭṭhaḥ appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ nacira ssevayassatthāya

original: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
analyzed: kula puttā sammad eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosāna

original: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati

original: Aññataro kho panāyasmā aṅgulimālo arahataṁ ahosi.
analyzed: aññataraḥ kho pana ayasmai aṅguli mālaḥ arahatam ahosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai aṅgulimālo pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññenapi leḍḍu khitto āyasmato aṅgulimālassa kāye nipatati,
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññena api leḍḍu khittaḥ āyasmataḥ aṅguli mālassa kāye nipatati

original: aññenapi daṇḍo khitto āyasmato aṅgulimālassa kāye nipatati, aññenapi sakkharā khittā
analyzed: aññena api daṇḍo khitto āyasmataḥ aṅguli mālassa kāye nipatati aññena api sakkharā khittā
āyasmataḥ aṅguli mālassa kāye nipatati

original: Atha kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo bhinnena sīsena, lohitena gaḷantena, bhinnena pattena, vipphālitāya saṅghāṭiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai aṅguli mālaḥ bhinnena sīsena lohitena gaḷantena bhinnena pattena vipphālitāya saṅghāṭiyā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ aṅgulimālaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā khalu bhagavān āyasmantam aṅguli mālam āgacchanta
disvānaḥ āyasmantam aṅguli mālam etat avoca
adhivāsehi tva brāhmaṇa adhivāsehi tva brāhmaṇa

original: Yassa kho tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni
analyzed: yassa kho tva brāhmaṇa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassa satāni bahūni

original: vassasahassāni niraye pacceyyāsi tassa tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, kammassa vipākaṁ diṭṭheva
analyzed: vassa sahassāni niraye pacceyyāsi tassa tva brāhmaṇa kammassa vipākam diṭṭhā iva
dhamme paṭisavedesi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo rahogato paṭisallīno vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedi;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai aṅguli mālaḥ rahogataḥ paṭisallīnaḥ vimutti sukham paṭisavedi
imam udānam udānesi
